collections.title: Product Managers and Designers Prompts
collections.description: ChatGPT prompts for product managers and designers

promptTemplates.title: Feature Development Brainstorm
promptTemplates.content: Brainstorm potential features for a new {product_managers_product_type} targeting {product_managers_target_market}.

promptTemplates.title: User Persona Creation
promptTemplates.content: Create a detailed user persona for {product_managers_product_name}, focusing on {product_managers_user_demographics}.

promptTemplates.title: UX Review
promptTemplates.content: Conduct a UX review for {product_managers_website_or_app} and suggest improvements.

placeholders.value: young adults interested in mental health
placeholders.headline: User Demographics
